definition: key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: Type the text that appears as a hyperlink in your document.
sentences.chinese: 鍵入在文檔中作爲超級鏈接顯示的文本。

sentences.english: The idea of an edit box, of course, is to allow users to type something in.
sentences.chinese: 編輯框旨在允許用戶鍵入某些內容。

sentences.english: You type at the keyboard words that you want to encrypt.
sentences.chinese: 你從鍵盤上鍵入你想加密的單詞。

sentences.english: Type the account name in the format "domainuser".
sentences.chinese: 請以“域用戶”格式鍵入帳戶名。

sentences.english: Type in the title or the author's name, please.
sentences.chinese: 請鍵入書名或作者姓名。

sentences.english: Step 6 – Type the keys that you want to use to bring up the emoticon.
sentences.chinese: 鍵入你想使用的關鍵字來說明圖釋。

sentences.english: A computer can soak up all you key into it.
sentences.chinese: 計算機你鍵入什麼它都能記住。

sentences.english: So Arg V bracket I, gives me the Ife string that I typed in.
sentences.chinese: 那麼Argv，把我剛鍵入的字符串Ife傳給我。

sentences.english: Enter a name for the new configuration.
sentences.chinese: 爲這個新配置鍵入一個名稱。

sentences.english: The account name you typed is not valid.
In the Confirm password box , retype the password to use with this account .
sentences.chinese: 請在“確認密碼”框中再次鍵入此帳戶的密碼。

sentences.english: Type the footnote or endnote content in this area.
sentences.chinese: 在這一區域鍵入腳註或尾註的內容。

sentences.english: This saves you the trouble of having to re-type the regular expression every time.
sentences.chinese: 這樣您就不必每次都要重新鍵入正則表達式。

sentences.english: Enter the name of your configured test case.
sentences.chinese: 鍵入您的配置測試用例的名稱。

sentences.english: The alias is expanded from what you type to its expansion.
sentences.chinese: 別名從您鍵入的內容展開爲其展開形式。

sentences.english: In the first window, type in the Bonjour or IP address and hit connect.
sentences.chinese: 在第一個窗口中，鍵入或IP地址和卓悅擊中連接。
